channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The secret to a longer life could be this old-fashioned English breakfast
item.description: Two separate studies find these old-school breakfast dishes can slow aging.

item.title: Senator’s RISE Act would require AI developers to list training data, evaluation methods in exchange for ‘safe harbor’ from lawsuits
item.description: The developer must also publish known failure modes, keep all documentation current, and push updates within 30 days of a version change.
